rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with a foyer that adheres to Vastu guidelines by facing the east. It includes a small water feature and minimalistic decor.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Contemporary kitchen integrated with living space featuring an island counter and ample storage that respects local building norms. The design incorporates natural light from east-facing windows in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment Duplex
rooms.description: Serves as a versatile living space accommodating joint family needs, designed with convertible areas and modular furniture to optimize functionality. The design includes a designated study nook and ample storage solutions.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Includes utility rooms such as laundry, storage, and additional facilities for joint family requirements; designed according to local building codes and Vastu norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east as per Vastu guidelines.
Large windows on the eastern facade to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Small balcony integrated into the duplex design for additional outdoor space, with privacy screens.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Contemporary open terrace offering a relaxing space for joint family gatherings. The design incorporates a green roof aspect with native plants to respect local environmental norms and enhances Vastu energy.

openings.description: Elegant staircase leading from the ground floor to the rooftop terrace ensuring compliance with safety and local building norms.
Integrated LED lighting solutions designed for energy efficiency, complemented by skylights that adhere to Vastu principles.
